strapiPost.title: Start Your Independence Day Off By Running The Railyard
strapiPost.content:
Get a running start to your Independence Day festivities at the 2nd Annual Run the Railyard 5K, hosted by the Rotary Club of Downtown Rogers at Railyard Bike Park on Jul 4 at 7:30a.

  • Come together: The Run the Railyard 5K raises funds for Rotary Club's beautification projects in Rogers's Parks and provides a family-friendly holiday event in Downtown Rogers.  
  • Bring the family: The 3.5-mi course is dog, child, and stroller friendly, so bring the whole family for a run/walk around Lake Atalanta. The first 100 finishers will receive medals, and trophies will be given to the fastest man, fastest woman, and fastest person up the hill.

Register before noon on Monday, Jun 26, and you'll get two Dugout Premium tickets to the Jul 5 Naturals game. Sign up HERE.
